text: The men's light middleweight (71 kg/156.2 lbs) Full-Contact category at the W.A.K.O. World Championships 2007 in Coimbra was the sixth heaviest of the male Full-Contact tournaments, involving twenty-two fighters from five continents (Europe, Asia, North America, South America and Oceania). Each of the matches was three rounds of two minutes each and were fought under Full- Contact rules. Due to the smaller than necessary numbers for a thirty-two man tournament, ten of the contestants had byes through to the second round. The tournament gold medallist was Russia's Evgeny Grechishkin who defeated Norway's Christian Kvatningen in the final by unanimous decision. Defeated semi finalists Ukraine's Dmytro Yatskov and Poland's Mariusz Ziętek received bronze medals. ==Results== ===Key=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Abbreviation ! title: Men's Full-Contact at WAKO World Championships 2007 Coimbra -71 kg
